com.yahoo.labs.samoa.evaluation

Class BasicClassificationPerformanceEvaluator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.yahoo.labs.samoa.moa.AbstractMOAObject
      • com.yahoo.labs.samoa.evaluation.BasicClassificationPerformanceEvaluator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ClassificationPerformanceEvaluator, PerformanceEvaluator, MOAObject, Serializable

    public class BasicClassificationPerformanceEvaluator
extends AbstractMOAObject
implements ClassificationPerformanceEvaluator
    Classification evaluator that performs basic incremental evaluation.
    Version:
    $Revision: 7 $
    Author:
    Richard Kirkby (rkirkby@cs.waikato.ac.nz), Albert Bifet (abifet at cs dot waikato dot ac dot nz)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
